1: <pb/>Lajwi tu xin, max yalon pax Job:
2: <pb/><t>Caw wal wojtak sic'libil tol cayton tu' yayji. ¿Palta tok ay mac chi je' yalon oc ba watx'il satak Dios?</t>
3: <t>Ta chi jochej chi co teyelej co ba yetok Cham xin, a yin junok mil k'anej Cham, tok ay junok chi je' co paktzeni.</t>
4: <t>Yujtol a Dios caw wal miman yayji oc Cham yin is jelanil c'al yin is yipalil, ¿mac wal junok chi je' tec'ban ba satak Cham cax c'am jabok tzet chi oni?</t>
5: <t>A Dios chi yak' bilaj mimek witz yuj yowal c'ul, chi yuchon elok, yin c'am bay chi yala'.</t>
6: <t>A' chi ak'on bilaj tx'otx' tx'otx' c'al yak'on tz'eylabok aj yichlak.</t>
7: <t>A Cham chi je' yalon bay c'u tol c'am chi ajolok, c'al chi je' makchen el sat waycan yet c'am chi joplabi.</t>
8: <t>Tokwal ay mac max colwaj yetok yet max watx'nen satcan, asannej chi tec'on pananbok sat a' mar yet chi aj wan a'.</t>
9: <t>A Cham max watx'nen juntzan waycan chi yik miman Oso, Orión, yetok Motz yetok juntzan bulquiltak waycan bay yetc'ulal sur.</t>
10: <t>Xiwil tzet yetal c'ayubtakxac'al chi yun Cham, a ton juntzan tzetak yetal tol c'am junok mactxel chi je' nachaj el yuj.</t>
11: <t>Ta chi ec' Dios in c'atan, tokwal ok je' wilon yin, chi mi ec' bay tu' tokwal ok nachaj el wuj.</t>
12: <t>Ta ay tzet yetal chi yiec' Cham bay junok, ¿mactxel ok je' tenon oc wanaj Cham? ¿mactxel ok je' k'anlen bay tzet chi yunej?</t>
13: <t>A Dios c'am tzet yuj chi oc wanaj yin tx'oxon yowal c'ul. Toltax eb ayoc yetok Rahab*fn* toxac'al chi ay moc'an eb yuj xiwc'ulal xol yakan Cham.</t>
14: <t>¿Baytal ok wi' in k'anej yet chin paktzen k'anej Dios?</t>
15: <t>Caxc'al mi c'am in yobtakil, palta c'am chi je' in tak'wi bay Cham; in juezal yayji ocok, asan tol chin k'an yabenc'ulal win bay.</t>
16: <t>K'inalok ta chi wawtej Cham bay satak beyc'ulal cax chi apni, c'am chi waoc yin in c'ul tol chin is cha k'anjab yetok.</t>
17: <t>A ti' yet, chin mi yak' lajwok yetok junok owal cak'ek' yaxnab, chitoc'al mi in yak' yasjok yin c'am tzet yujal.</t>
18: <t>C'am xam chi je' wion wip junok txolan, chi mi yak'xac'al low win xiwil yatakilal.</t>
19: <t>Ta chi co k'anlej: ¿mactxel yelxac'al ay yip? ta con chi: Tix in ti', ẍi mi Dios. Ta chi jochej chi jabej mac yel chi yala', ¿mactxel ok je' tec'ban ba in satak? ẍi mi Cham.</t>
20: <t>Ta chi wala' tol caw wal tojol in, a in k'anej chi tx'oxon elok tol ay in paltail. Ta chi wala' tol c'am jabok in tacnakilal, axa mi Dios chi aloni tol man yelok.</t>
21: <t>Ayin ti' c'am in mul, palta c'am welapnok yul in sat; c'amxa chi yal in c'ul chin iquisbic'al ec'ok.</t>
22: <t>A chi wut in naoni, lajanxac'al el masanil. A Cham chi ak'on c'ayil eb ay is mul, yetokc'al eb c'am is mul.</t>
23: <t>Ta c'uxan chi jayoc camich yiban masanil anima, tok ay tzet chi na Cham yet chi lajwi ay eb anima c'am is mul.</t>
24: <t>Chi cancan jun yulyibank'inal ti' yul k'ab eb yobtakwom yuj Cham, cax chi makay el sat eb juez yuj; ta manak Dios chi yunej, ¿mac pax txel xin?</t>
25: <t>Aymanxac'al chi beytoj in k'inal, c'amxac'al jabok tzalojc'ulalil chi wila'.</t>
26: <t>Lajan wal chi yun toj xuyuyok axca barco, axca c'apax toj xuynaj no tx'acbaj yintak is chibej.</t>
27: <t>Ta chi wochej chi tojcan c'ayc'ulal in yailal wuj, cax chin occan yin tzalojc'ulal,</t>
28: <t>chi xiwc'al in c'ul yuj in yailal tu', yujtol wojtak a Dios c'am chin yal watx'il.</t>
29: <t>Ta ay in mul yalon Cham, c'am jabok yelapnok yuj chi wak' wip walon tol watx' in.</t>
30: <t>Caxc'al mi chin tx'aj in k'ab yetok xapon cax chin tx'ajon wal yetok yal tan,</t>
31: <t>a Dios chin yac'al aytok xol chic'a'. Toltax in pichil yobxac'al yoc win chi wabej.</t>
32: <t>C'am chi je' paktzen junok animac'al axca ayin ti' bay Dios, tamwal ok je' waloni tol chi je' in toj yetok Cham satak juez.</t>
33: <t>Matawal ay junok chi je' yoc co nanalwomok yetok Cham, tol chi je' yaontok k'ab jiban co cawanil,</t>
34: <t>tol yuj, chi oc wanaj yak'on Cham in yailal, c'al in yaon oc yin xiwc'ulal.</t>
35: <t>Catatu' chi mi je' in k'anjab yin c'am xiwc'ulalil, yujtol c'am wal in mul chi yabtok in c'ul.</t>
